item.title: Ashley add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "Brevity is the soul of lingerie." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "If you look for perfection, you'll never be content." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Steven Moffat
item.description:
"Demons run when a good man goes to war Night will fall and drown the sun When a good man goes to war
Friendship dies and true love lies Night will fall and the dark will rise When a good man goes to war
Demons run, but count the cost The battle's won, but the child is lost" -- Steven Moffat

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Steven Moffat
item.description: "You want weapons? We're in a library! Books! The best weapons in the world!" -- Steven Moffat

item.title: Ashley add a quote by Dylan Thomas
item.description: "Do not go gentle into that good night. Rage, rage against the dying of the light." -- Dylan Thomas

item.title: Ashley add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Saying 'I notice you're a nerd' is like saying, 'Hey, I notice that you'd rather be intelligent than be stupid, that you'd rather be thoughtful than be vapid, that you believe that there are things that matter more than the arrest record of Lindsay Lohan. Why is that?' In fact, it seems to me that most contemporary insults are pretty lame. Even 'lame' is kind of lame. Saying 'You're lame' is like saying 'You walk with a limp.' Yeah, whatever, so does 50 Cent, and he's done all right for himself." -- John Green
